long_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Floating lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in the most adverse weather and float in water. Catalyzer coil produces a flame that reaches 2,000degF and withstands winds up to 80 mph; catalytic lighters can continue to operate when standard lighters. Piezo-electric ignition sparks the lighter to life every time, even when wet. Waterproof ABS plastic outer case is impact resistant; O-ring seals and wire bail make sure the lighter stays dry and buoyant. Flame indicator window glows a bright white color when the lighter is ignited. Flame adjustment control lets you find just the right oxygen mix for performance up to 8,000 ft. Ultimate Survival Floating lighter is easy to refill with butane lighter fluid (sold separately).
short_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Floating lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in the most adverse weather and float in water.
